page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW OF THE AREA
page.content:
The area covered by this part of the survey is part of{South Yorkshire}to the north and east of{Barnsley.}It includes the townships of{Royston}and {Cudworth}and the villages of{Shafton, {Carlton}and{Monk Bretton.
All of these are part of{Barnsley {Metropolitan Borough}and are physically separate from Barnsley except for Monk Bretton.
The county authority is {South {Yorkshire County Council}which was formed in 1974 but which will be abolished in March 1986 despite much local opposition.
